definitions.definition: The ability to sense , feel or perceive ; responsiveness to sensory stimuli ; sensitivity .
Emotional or artistic awareness ; keen sensitivity to matters of feeling or creative expression.
Excessive emotional awareness; the fact or quality of being overemotional .

examples: I apologize if I offended your sensibilities , but that's the truth of the matter.

definitions.definition: The capacity to be perceived by the senses.

main_definition: The ability to sense , feel or perceive ; responsiveness to sensory stimuli ; sensitivity . [from 15th c.]
secondary_definitions: Emotional or artistic awareness ; keen sensitivity to matters of feeling or creative expression. [from 17th c.]
( now rare , archaic ) Excessive emotional awareness; the fact or quality of being overemotional . [from 18th c.]
( in the plural ) An acute awareness or feeling. [from 18th c.]
( obsolete ) The capacity to be perceived by the senses. [15th–17th c.]
